short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trading automation using webhooks and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring your trading to next level by connecting your favourite exchanges.
By utilizing webhooks, you will be able to execute trades in real-time.
Bringing your market analysis and profits together.

This extension uses affiliate programs, which means we earn a small commission at no extra cost to you when you trade through a broker provided by our extension.

For the best support, please create a support ticket: support@autoview.com
You may also visit our Discord server: https://discord.gg/autoview

Exporting and importing credentials allows for ease of backing up and recovery.

The Alert Syntax is also available on our website: https://autoview.com/syntax/
